desc: A haven dedicated to fulfilling all spiritual paths. We stock ethically sourced crystals, pure essential oils, incense, sterling silver and gemstone jewellery, tarot and oracle decks, books, Himalayan salt products, crystal lamps, t.light holders and much much more.

layout.text: Ethically sourced beautiful crystals, incense, books, essential oils, jewellery, candles, tarot/oracle cards and gifts.
